mapper.sql: NATURAL_RELATIVE_ID, PARTY_ID, RELATIVEID_PARTY_ID, CERTIFICATE_TYPE_CD, CERT_ID, CONTACT_TEL_NUM, INPUT_ORG_NUM, UPDATE_ORG_NUM, UPDATE_USER_NUM, REMARK, BIRTHDAY, UPDATE_TIME, APPELLATION, ACCOUNTING_ASSISTANT, INDUSTRY, MONTHLY_INCOME, CUST_RELA, PARTNERCOMPANY, PARTNERPHONENUM, LEGAL_CONTRY, CERT_BEGIN_DATE, CERT_END_DATE, CUST_TYPE, ISCOUT, PARTY_NAME, PAR_SEQ_ID, RELATION_ID
mapper.select: select r.*,np.CERT_NUM certNum,np.CERT_TYPE certType,p.PARTY_TYPE_CD partyTypeCd from TB_CSM_NATURAL_RELATIVE r left join TB_CSM_NATURAL_PERSON np on r.PARTY_ID = np.PARTY_ID left join TB_CSM_PARTY p on r.PARTY_ID = p.PARTY_ID where r.PARTY_ID = #{partyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_CSM_NATURAL_RELATIVE (NATURAL_RELATIVE_ID, PARTY_ID, RELATIVEID_PARTY_ID, CERTIFICATE_TYPE_CD, CERT_ID, CONTACT_TEL_NUM, INPUT_ORG_NUM, UPDATE_ORG_NUM, UPDATE_USER_NUM, REMARK, BIRTHDAY, UPDATE_TIME, APPELLATION, ACCOUNTING_ASSISTANT, INDUSTRY, MONTHLY_INCOME, CUST_RELA, PARTNERCOMPANY, PARTNERPHONENUM, LEGAL_CONTRY, CERT_BEGIN_DATE, CERT_END_DATE, CUST_TYPE, ISCOUT, PARTY_NAME, PAR_SEQ_ID, RELATION_ID ) values (#{naturalRelativeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relativeidPartyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificateTypeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactTelNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputOrgNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateOrgNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUserNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{appellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountingAssistant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monthlyIncome,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custRela,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partnercompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partnerphonenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalContry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certBeginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{certEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{custType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iscout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parSeqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

where NATURAL_RELATIVE_ID = #{naturalRelativeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
